title: pOge pOge
sahitya:
pOge pOge nInu


anupallavi

  pOge sakhi pOgi nI krSNana tOrE


caraNam 1    brndAvanadalli Aduva gOkula kandana nInu tOrE
    caraNam 2    gOvardhanadalli gOvugaLannu kAida gOkula nandana nInu tOrE
    caraNam 3    pannaga shayana shrI purandara viTTala mannisi bEgane tOrE
